name: Muramasa Rebirth: Genroku Legends - Fishy Tales of the Nekomata
summary: The first of the Genroku Legends additional scenarios for Muramasa Rebirth. This add-on follows the story of Okoi, who is possessed by Miike, a nekomata. Okoi avenges the death of her brother using her cat-like claws and demon powers to summon hordes of cat allies to battle alongside her.
